SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ClientView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ClientView
public class ClientView extends Object
The ClientView class represents the client's view of the game. It holds the current state of the client's game session and provides methods to interact with the game and handle updates.
